content:
I think I can make an educated guess about the mountain range you're referring to!

Based on your hint about skiing and looking forward to warmer weather, I'm going to take a guess that you visited the Rocky Mountains, possibly in Colorado, Utah, or Wyoming. Am I correct?

The Rocky Mountains offer some of the best skiing in the country, and the weather can be quite cold and snowy in February. After a fun-filled skiing trip, it's natural to look forward to warmer weather and the beauty of the mountains in the summer.

If I'm correct, I can provide more specific recommendations for scenic drives and hiking trails in the Rocky Mountains. Let me know if I'm on the right track, or if I need to keep guessing!
